item.ascended_quark.blue_swet_in_a_skyro: Blue Swet In A Skyroot Bucket
item.ascended_quark.golden_swet_in_a_sky: Golden Swet In A Skyroot Bucket
lore.block.ascended_quark.aerogel_vertic: Crafted from Aerogel. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.aether_dirt_br: Crafted from Aether Dirt Brick. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Brick. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Brick. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
Crafted from Aether Dirt Brick. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Aether Dirt and is sturdier than it too.
lore.block.ascended_quark.ambrosium_lamp: A lamp made out of Holystone and Ambrosium. Ambrosium Blocks can increase its light up to 4 times.
lore.block.ascended_quark.angelic_vertic: Crafted from Angelic. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.blue_berry_cra: A handy crate for storing blue berries! A very good decoration block!
lore.block.ascended_quark.crystal_fruit_: Crafted from Crystal Fruit Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
Crafted from Crystal Fruit Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.crystal_leaf_c: Crafted from Crystal Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.crystal_skyroo: Crafted from Crystal Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.decorated_holi: Crafted from Decorated Holiday Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
Crafted from Decorated Holiday Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.golden_oak_lea: Crafted from Golden Oak Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.golden_skyroot: Crafted from Golden Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.hellfire_verti: Crafted from Hellfire. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holiday_leaf_c: Crafted from Holiday Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holiday_skyroo: Crafted from Holiday Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.hollow_skyroot: Can be crafted with four Skyroot Logs. You can sneak into them horizontally, anc climb inside of them vertically!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holystone_bric: Crafted from Holystone Brick. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.holystone_furn: A versatile furnace that can also use Ambrosium as fuel. Also looks fancier in white.
lore.block.ascended_quark.holystone_vert: Crafted from Holystone. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.icestone_brick: Crafted from Icestone Brick. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Icestone Brick. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Icestone Brick. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
Crafted from Icestone Brick. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Icestone and is sturdier than it too.
lore.block.ascended_quark.icestone_verti: Crafted from Icestone. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.mossy_holyston: Crafted from Mossy Holystone. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.polished_icest: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Polished I and is sturdier than it too.
Crafted from Polished Icestone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Polished Icestone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Polished Icestone. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
Crafted from Polished Icestone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.ascended_quark.quicksoil_bric: Crafted from Quicksoil Brick. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Quicksoil Brick. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Quicksoil Brick. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
Crafted from Quicksoil Brick. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Quicksoil and is sturdier than it too.
lore.block.ascended_quark.quicksoil_fram: Combine Iron Ingots and Quicksoil Glass, and you get yourself some fancy Quicksoil Framed Glass. Great for some more rustic or medieval builds.
A thin decorative variant of Quicksoil Framed Glass. Great for some more rustic or medieval builds.
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_chest: A nice looking chest made out of Skyroot. Perfect blend for your storage room.
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_hedge: Crafted from Skyroot. They connect to each other like fences, and have the same bounding box. You can even put flowers on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_ladder: Hey look! Now ladders can be made out of Skyroot!
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_leaf_c: Crafted from Skyroot Leaf. Leaf Carpets are a great way to add natural elements to your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_post: Crafted from Skyroot. These are slim log style blocks you can lay down vertically or horizontally. Chains and lanterns can also connect to them.
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_stick_: Cool looking pillar to store your sticks, or to integrate them into your builds!
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_stool: Stools can be created the same way you'd make a Bed, but using slabs instead of full wood blocks. As you can expect, you can sit on them!
lore.block.ascended_quark.skyroot_vertic: Crafted from Skyroot. Vertical Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration. Try adding some to a building's window!
lore.block.ascended_quark.stripped_skyro: Crafted from Stripped Skyroot. These are slim log style blocks you can lay down vertically or horizontally. Chains and lanterns can also connect to them.
lore.block.ascended_quark.vertical_skyro: Simple vertical planks to spice up your creativity.
lore.item.ascended_quark.ambrosium_torch: An arrow tied to an Ambrosium Torch. It imbues the healing properties of Ambrosium, and places the torch on impact.
lore.item.ascended_quark.blue_swet_in_a_: Seems like you caught a Blue Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
Seems like you caught a Blue Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
lore.item.ascended_quark.golden_swet_in_: Seems like you caught a Golden Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
Seems like you caught a Golden Swet! Not that useful, but it's an easy way to transport them. They might get excited too!
lore.item.ascended_quark.quicksoil_glass: Apparently something broke. You can still use some of the shards to craft the glass again.
